VM.content: phenomenology, passageway to essentiality, would be impossible w/out anticipation [presupposition, metaphysical decision] of Being not exhausted by reality
VM.linkedContent: phenomenology, passageway to essentiality, would be impossible w/out anticipation [presupposition, metaphysical decision] of Being not exhausted by reality

VM.content: Nicholas of Cusa: God is absolute presupposition itself, of all things
VM.linkedContent: Nicholas of Cusa: God is absolute presupposition itself, of all things

VP.content: Husserl insists on the absence of all presuppositions (Voraussetzungslosigkeit) whether metaphysical, psychological or from natural sciences: does this not all still dissimulate a metaphysical presupposition?
VP.linkedContent: Husserl insists on the absence of all presuppositions (Voraussetzungslosigkeit) whether metaphysical, psychological or from natural sciences: does this not all still dissimulate a metaphysical presupposition?

VP.content: starting point in “Fatkum” of language not a presupposition so long as we’re attentive to contingency of example
VP.linkedContent: starting point in “Fatkum” of language not a presupposition so long as we’re attentive to contingency of example

FWT.content: Derrida looks for price to be paid when theoretical progress is made [re: Foucault] via presupposition > makes it possible to accelerate and to absorb shock of acceleration (break)
FWT.linkedContent: Derrida looks for price to be paid when theoretical progress is made [re: Foucault] via presupposition > makes it possible to accelerate and to absorb shock of acceleration (break)

POS.content: “everyday language” neither innocent nor neutral, language of Western metaphysics, carries w/ it considerable presuppositions
POS.linkedContent: “everyday language” neither innocent nor neutral, language of Western metaphysics, carries w/ it considerable presuppositions

POS.content: communication: transmission of identity of signified object from one subject (presupposes subject) to another: A communicates B to C
POS.linkedContent: communication: transmission of identity of signified object from one subject (presupposes subject) to another: A communicates B to C

P.content: fundamental presupposition in Critique: aesthetic judgment must bear upon intrinsic beauty, know difference btwn extrinsic/intrinsic
P.linkedContent: fundamental presupposition in Critique: aesthetic judgment must bear upon intrinsic beauty, know difference btwn extrinsic/intrinsic

ROP.content: immanence of presupposition (Voraussetzung) constantly required in Hegelian dialectic
ROP.linkedContent: immanence of presupposition (Voraussetzung) constantly required in Hegelian dialectic

SP.content: Derrida’s debt to other readings (of Nietzsche) should be presupposed in its totality
SP.linkedContent: Derrida’s debt to other readings (of Nietzsche) should be presupposed in its totality

GSP.content: radicalization of presuppositions history & psychology made phenomenology necessary

O.content: acc. Feuerbach, Hegel’s exposition was supposed to have presupposed nothing, to leave no residue, empty & drain us completely
O.linkedContent: acc. Feuerbach, Hegel’s exposition was supposed to have presupposed nothing, to leave no residue, empty & drain us completely

WAP.content: philosophy, by right, must claim to be justified, at every moment (thus rupture), to put into question every “presupposition” (incl. those of “philosophy”) > vertical self-institution
WAP.linkedContent: philosophy, by right, must claim to be justified, at every moment (thus rupture), to put into question every “presupposition” (incl. those of “philosophy”) > vertical self-institution

WAP.content: “presupposition,” word Derrida uses to determine implication of implicit
WAP.linkedContent: “presupposition,” word Derrida uses to determine implication of implicit

Gi.content: being-with does not arise from factical connection, a species-like unification (gattungshafte Zusammenstreben) “metaphysically presupposes” dissemination of Dasein, thus Mitsein
Gi.linkedContent: being-with does not arise from factical connection, a species-like unification (gattungshafte Zusammenstreben) “metaphysically presupposes” dissemination of Dasein, thus Mitsein

REST.content: pre-text as a pretext to bash on w/ must hackneyed, crude, and tired discourses (pour asséner le discourse le plus éculé, le plus fruste, le plus fatigué)
REST.linkedContent: pre-text as a pretext to bash on w/ must hackneyed, crude, and tired discourses (pour asséner le discourse le plus éculé, le plus fruste, le plus fatigué)

LI.content: Austin’s strategy of exclusion fraught w/ metaphysical presuppositions [re: nonserious, parasite]
LI.linkedContent: Austin’s strategy of exclusion fraught w/ metaphysical presuppositions [re: nonserious, parasite]

LI.content: Derrida cannot accept distinction btwn strategical decision & metaphysical presupposition: every strategy has a decision concerning metaphysics > the more confident, implicit, the more its order and calm reigns over methodological technicity
LI.linkedContent: Derrida cannot accept distinction btwn strategical decision & metaphysical presupposition: every strategy has a decision concerning metaphysics > the more confident, implicit, the more its order and calm reigns over methodological technicity

LI.content: deconstruction aims to analyze & if possible transform network of presuppositions of any legitimacy
LI.linkedContent: deconstruction aims to analyze & if possible transform network of presuppositions of any legitimacy

EW.content: Da of Dasein singularizes itself w/out being reducible to any categories of human subjectivity (self, rational being, consciousness, person), because it is presupposed by all of these
EW.linkedContent: Da of Dasein singularizes itself w/out being reducible to any categories of human subjectivity (self, rational being, consciousness, person), because it is presupposed by all of these

BSi.content: Derrida one of the few who smiles at machine of presuppositions to be deconstructed in “law,” “freedom,” “institution,” “culture”
BSi.linkedContent: Derrida one of the few who smiles at machine of presuppositions to be deconstructed in “law,” “freedom,” “institution,” “culture”

CHOR.content: I am going too quickly, I’m schematizing excessively: Heidegger begins by denying all forms of security, all sedimented presuppositions of classical ontology
CHOR.linkedContent: I am going too quickly, I’m schematizing excessively: Heidegger begins by denying all forms of security, all sedimented presuppositions of classical ontology
